events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's background and resume.
Assigning recruiter to manage the candidate interaction and scheduling of interviews for the software engineer role.
Initial screening completed with positive feedback regarding candidate’s core software development skills and experience.
Candidate responded promptly to screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding with the technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team next week.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and coding skills.
HR interview scheduled to discuss candidate’s fit within company culture, benefits, and role expectations.
HR interview went smoothly with positive responses on candidate’s alignment to company values and work preferences.
Offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date for the engineering position.
Candidate has provided positive feedback and requested clarification on a few benefits and remote work policies.
Candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed their start date as agreed upon with HR.
Onboarding process has been initiated including setup of accounts, training scheduling, and team introductions.
The hiring process is officially closed with the successful recruitment and onboarding of the software engineer.
